Package org.graffiti.options

Contains the option pane functionality.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    OptionPane
    The interface all option panes must implement.
    PreferencesInterface
    Classes that want to provide settings that will be stored in a settings file and that want to be user-configurable can implement this interface.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AbstractOptionPane
    The default implementation of the option pane interface.
    AddonsOptionsPane  
    GravistoPreferences  
    OptionGroup
    Represents an option pane group.
    OptionsDialog
    Represents the Preference Dialog that shows all the settings / preferences for Vanted
    OverviewOptionPane
    The overview pane for the options dialog.
    ParameterOptionPane  
    PreferencePanel
